materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph of a collection of stuffed animals taken in Kandy, Sri Lanka. There are various animals presented on raised platforms. Various birds are perched on a tree branch. There are two leopards, one on either side of the tree, placed on platforms. At the bottom of the platform, there are several other small animals, such as deers and geese, on the ground. Sparse vegetation is added amongst the animals. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Mr. White's Stuffed Specimens, Kandy, Ceylon
subject_terms_2: Photographs Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Kandy (Sri Lanka) Taxidermy Hobbies
